hero.title: We make PDFs easy.
hero.description: Discover all the tools you need to work more productively and intelligently with documents.

popular.title: Most Popular PDF Tools
popular.description: 30 tools are available to convert, compress, and edit PDFs for free. Try them now!

pdfToWord.name: PDF to Word
pdfToWord.description: Convert PDF to editable Word documents

merge.name: Merge PDF
merge.description: Combine multiple PDFs into one unified document

jpgToPdf.name: JPG to PDF
jpgToPdf.description: Convert JPG, PNG, BMP, GIF, and TIFF images to PDF

sign.name: Sign PDF
sign.description: Create and add electronic signatures to documents

edit.name: Edit PDF
edit.description: Add text, shapes, images, and freehand annotations to PDFs

compress.name: Compress PDF
compress.description: Reduce PDF size without lowering quality

simple.title: Simplify Simple Tasks
simple.description: Freeconvert, the world's only PDF software that everyone will love. Discover all the tools you need to start, manage, and finish your digital document work with Freeconvert.

workWithFiles.title: Work with Documents Directly from Files
workWithFiles.description: Do more than just view PDF documents. Highlight documents and add text, images, shapes, and freehand annotations as you wish. Connect to 30 other tools to further improve your files.

digitalSignature.title: Simplified Digital Signatures
digitalSignature.description: Handle tasks such as filling out forms, signing contracts electronically, and closing deals with just a few simple steps. In addition, you can request electronic signatures and track your documents at every step.

perfectDocument.title: Perfect Documents Made with Freeconvert
perfectDocument.description: Is your file too large? Compress it to reduce its size. Need a file in a specific format? Use the converter to convert files to your desired format. Is document management getting complicated? Try merging and splitting files or deleting extra pages. Discover all these features with Freeconvert.

allInOne.title: All Document Management in One Place
allInOne.description: You no longer need to work across multiple apps! Working directly on the Freeconvert web platform saves time spent storing, managing, and sharing files across multiple devices.

mobile.title: Use on Mobile
mobile.description: Create PDFs from scanned documents, organize documents, and share files on any device connected to the Freeconvert mobile app, anytime, anywhere.

trustedByUsers.title: Trusted by Millions of Users
trustedByUsers.description: Over 1 billion users use Freeconvert services and experience simplified digital document work.

trustedByBusiness.title: Trusted by Businesses
trustedByBusiness.description: Freeconvert is one of the PDF software solutions that has achieved high ratings on major B2B software ranking platforms such as Capterra, G2, and TrustPilot.

trustedByPartners.title: Trusted by Partners
trustedByPartners.description: Unlock additional features with the Freeconvert Chrome extension, Google Workspace, and Dropbox apps. All are available for free.

support.title: 24/7 Customer Support
support.description: We provide help whenever you need it with 24/7 customer support.

encryption.title: 256-bit TLS Encryption
encryption.description: All information transmission is securely protected using 256-bit TLS encryption.

security.title: Security Standards
security.description: Freeconvert prioritizes user safety. We are ISO/IEC 27001 certified and comply with GDPR, CCPA, and nFADP.

trial.title: Freeconvert Free Trial
trial.description: Start a 7-day free trial and use all Freeconvert tools including conversion, compression, and electronic signatures without limits.

edit.title: PDF Editor
edit.description: Easily add text, images, shapes, highlights, and annotations to your PDFs. With a Pro account, you can also edit existing text.
edit.supportedFormats: Supported formats: PDF, DOC, XLS, PPT, PNG, JPG

proFeature.title: Pro Feature
proFeature.description: Direct text editing is available with a Pro account. Start a 7-day free trial and experience all features.

section.title: Edit Your PDFs—The Easy Way
section.description: Document work shouldn't be hard. That's why we've simplified PDF editing, so you can have the freedom and flexibility to do anything you want with your professional documents.

powerful.title: Powerful PDF Editing—Totally Simple
powerful.description: When we say 'edit,' we really mean 'edit.' Add new text, edit existing text, highlight, draw, insert shapes and images—whatever you need, we've got it. So simple to use, no setup or onboarding needed. Get started right away.

organize.title: Document Organization at a Glance
organize.description: Use the Organize mode to rearrange, merge, extract, split, and more. With a host of file-type export options, save your document in any format you like. You can even compress or flatten your PDF—your document, your way.

share.title: Quick to Save, Easy to Share
share.description: Done making magic and editing your PDF? Simply save your edited file to Freeconvert, your device, or any of our connected apps, such as Dropbox or G Suite, or share it with a quick download link.

howto.title: How To Edit a PDF File Online for Free
howto.step1: Import or drag & drop your PDF file to our editor.
howto.step2: Add text, images, shapes, markups, and e-signatures as desired.
howto.step4: Click to "Export" your file as a PDF or other file type.
howto.step5: Download your edited PDF when ready—that's it!

gdpr.title: GDPR Compliance
gdpr.description: We comply with the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR), ensuring we manage your personal data correctly.

iso.title: ISO/IEC 27001 Certification
iso.description: We are audited annually for our ISO/IEC 27001 certification, a mark that assures the safety and security of your information.

encryption.title: File Transfer Encryption
encryption.description: We even keep your files secure while you're editing, compressing, or converting them, with high-tech TLS encryption.

annotate.title: Annotate PDF
annotate.description: Mark up, highlight, and add text on your PDFs right in your browser for free. Easily annotate PDFs online for faster feedback and easier edits. No downloads or signups needed.
annotate.supportedFormats: Supported formats: PDF, DOC, XLS, PPT, PNG, JPG

section.title: Add Clarity and Context to Any PDF
section.description: Whether you're reviewing a contract, preparing a presentation, filling out a form, or giving feedback on a report, Freeconvert makes it easy to add text, drawings, images, and highlights directly on your PDFs.

clear.title: Stay Clear & Organized
clear.description: Use colors, shapes, and callouts to emphasize key points or needed updates. Keep your annotations neat and easy to follow for faster reviews and approvals.

forms.title: Fill Out Forms Quickly
forms.description: Add your information directly to the auto-detected fields. You can just start typing without needing to add any textboxes—quick and easy!

anywhere.title: Work Anywhere, Anytime
anywhere.description: Annotate from your browser on Mac, Windows, Linux, iOS, or Android. No software downloads, no learning curve. Just upload, mark up, and share.

immediate.title: Start Immediately—No Fuss
immediate.description: Annotate PDFs directly in your browser. No downloads, signups, or complicated setup. Just upload, annotate, and be on your way.

keyInfo.title: Highlight Key Information
keyInfo.description: Emphasize text, figures, or sections with custom highlight colors and a versatile pencil tool to make reviews faster and clearer.

feedback.title: Feedback Where It Counts
feedback.description: Add text or highlights exactly where you need them, so your feedback is always clear, relevant, and actionable.

secure.title: Secure & Private
secure.description: We're GDPR compliant, ISO/IEC 27001 certified, and we protect your files with TLS encryption. Files are auto-deleted after one hour for extra peace of mind.

focus.title: Show Readers Where to Focus
focus.description: Circle figures, underline phrases, or use arrows and shapes to guide attention in your PDF. Leave no doubt where people need to focus.

device.title: Annotate on Any Device
device.description: Whether you're at your desk or on the go, annotate PDFs from any device with internet access: desktop, tablet, or mobile.

howto.title: How To Annotate PDF Pages Online for Free
howto.step1: Drag & drop your PDF into our free Annotate tool.
howto.step2: Use the toolbar to add text, drawings, or shapes.
howto.step3: Markup the text with highlights, underlines, strikethroughs, and more.
howto.step4: Click 'Finish' to download your PDF, or edit further with 30+ tools.
